description: This is a course about two programs in which you will be able to create something yourself. With help of them, you can create screen savers, videos, animations, images, etc. The course consists of video lessons, to some of them are attached fonts and codes. The duration of the course depends on the person, besides it can and should be learned several times. Each time you will discover something new. The exact duration of the course can not be determined, as the course will be often accompanied with new videos and will rise in price. The structure of this course aviods any plan, so you will be able to start with any video lesson you like. I will talk about the possibilities of these programs, their nuances and give you more than a basic knowledge and skills using incredible examples. After taking the course, you will be able to create a variety of things, so it gives you an opportunity to earn a lot of money, make creative gifts and surprise people.
title: Training courses Adobe After Effect and Cinema 4D
